_sText:
de_icicle

Terrorists:
Bomb the attic of the mining cabin so that the cold winds will blow inside and make the cabin uninhabitable. That'll surely make the miners stop mining for the lost Nazi gold of the Alps.

If the plan fails, bomb the tool shed out of spite.

Counter-Terrorists:
Stop the terrorists from bombing the cabin and destroying Christmas for the miners.

Don't be surprised if the terrorists bomb the tool shed out of spite.

Map by: Pvt. Murre (Christoffer Frank)

2012
